speaking.paragraph: Madam President, today I recognize Faulkton, SD. The town of Faulkton will celebrate its 125th anniversary this year.

Faulkton was founded in 1882 and named after Territorial Governor Andrew J. Faulk. Located in Faulk County, it has served as the county seat since 1886. Faulkton has been a successful and thriving community for the past 125 years and I am confident that it will continue to serve as an example of South Dakota values and traditions for the next 125 years.
I would like to offer my congratulations to the citizens of Faulkton on their anniversary and wish them continued prosperity in the years to come.
